mapper.select: SELECT I_B.I_KEY , I_B.I_NAME , I_B.DESCRIPTION , I_B.COLLOQ , I_B.PLAINTEXT , I_G.BASE , I_G.PURCHASABLE , I_G.TOTAL , I_G.SELL , I_I.I_FULL FROM ITEM_BASIC I_B JOIN ITEM_GOLD I_G ON I_B.I_KEY = I_G.I_KEY JOIN ITEM_IMAGE I_I ON I_B.I_KEY = I_I.I_KEY
SELECT C_B.C_KEY , C_B.ID , C_B.C_NAME , C_B.TITLE , C_B.BLURB , C_B.PAR_TYPE , C_I.C_FULL FROM CHAMPION_BASIC C_B JOIN CHAMPION_IMAGE C_I ON C_B.C_KEY = C_I.C_KEY
SELECT SS_B.S_KEY , SS_B.ID , SS_B.S_NAME , SS_B.DESCRIPTION , SS_I.S_FULL FROM SUMMONER_SPELLS_BASIC SS_B JOIN SUMMONER_SPELLS_IMAGE SS_I ON SS_B.S_KEY = SS_I.S_KEY ORDER BY SS_B.S_KEY
